contentrichtext.text: <!-------------------------------------------------------------------------------> <!-- MoS:Disambiguation - prefer ONE LINK per entry, short descriptions. --> <!-- Avoid piping, external links, and red links with little article potential --> <!-------------------------------------------------------------------------------> '''DDC''' may stand for: *Hip-hop group [[Deep Dickollective]], also known as D/DC *[[Dewey Decimal Classification]] *[[Digital Down Converter]], one of the methods in digital signal processing *[[Direct Digital Control]], reading and steering of HVAC devices *[[Display Data Channel]], communication protocol between a graphics card and a monitor defined by VESA *The [[U.S. District Court for the District of Columbia]] *[[Detroit Diesel Corporation]] *The IATA airport code for [[Dodge City Regional Airport]] in Dodge City, Kansas *Dopa Decarboxylase or [[Aromatic-L-amino-acid decarboxylase]] *[[Double Disc Court]] *[[Dideoxycytidine]] (ddC, zalcitabine) *[[Dzongkha Development Commission]] *[[Pirated movie release types#Release formats|Digital Distribution Copy]] *Double Dutch Club {{disambig}}
